page.title: 16Playground Games.(2)
page.content: (Continued from Page 15) ..After a period of time 'Dracula' leaps out and chases someone.When he/she catches them he prentends to bite them,and bumps them(gently).Very popular are the traditional handclapping games,with chanting to a regular beat.Two girls stand opposite each other and repeat clapping their own hands and their partners.They also point and mime to these words: I went to a Chinese restaurant To buy a loaf of bread,bread,bread He wrapped it up in a five pound note And this is what he said,said,said My name is Eggani,Eggani,Chickeni Chickeni,Ooli,Ooli,Wom Pom Pairy Wally Wally Whiskers..Brown bread. Have you seen ny father's.. bald head Lying on the sofa..half dead. Repeat: My name is......etc. (C0ntinued on Page 17)
